text: is a Japanese football club which plays in J3 League. ==Club name== *1976-1990: Onishi SC *1991-2003: Imao FC *2004-2008: Ehime Shimanami FC *2009-2011: Ehime FC Shimanami *2012-present: FC Imabari ==League position== *2017: Football League - 6th *2018: Football League - 5th *2019: Football League - 3rd *2020: J3 League - 7th == Other websites == * Category:1970s establishments in Japan Category:1976 establishments in Asia Category:Football clubs in Ehime Prefecture
title: FC Imabari
